Authors: Dramilio A., Faustine C., Sanjaya S., Soewito B.
Title: The effect and technique in search engine optimization
Source title: Proceedings of 2020 International Conference on Information Management and Technology, ICIMTech 2020
Affiliations: School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Computer Science Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; BINUS Graduate Program -Master of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Computer Science Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Dramilio, A., School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Computer Science Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Faustine, C., School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Computer Science Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Sanjaya, S., School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Computer Science Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Soewito, B., BINUS Graduate Program -Master of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Computer Science Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: In this modern era, we can find for anything anytime, anywhere on the internet. Most people will find it on Google. When we look for something, we will go to Google search engines. Google has more than 35 trillion Web Pages on the internet and if we have a website how can people notice your website that is buried with other 35 trillion websites? The question is how to make our website can be in the top position of search results. The answer is simple, that is by optimizing search engines on your website. In this paper we will inform SEO techniques such as onsite optimization and offsite optimization along with the effects of the two techniques which also allows your website to be on the top search of results. Finally, we also discussed the benefits of the website being to be the top in search engine. © 2020 IEEE.
Author Keywords: Off-site optimization; Onsite optimization; Search engine optimization; Search ranking
Index Keywords: Information management; Search engines; Google search engine; Search engine optimizations; Websites
